# RNALight Website

There are two directories in this code:
1. Backend
2. Frontend

## Backend

To enable the APIs, open the `app.py` code present in [this](https://github.com/abhishek23008/RNALightImpl_Website/blob/main/Backend/app.py) directory. Start the API service by running the following command:
```
python app.py
```

This wiil start the API, and all the endpoints will be available at the `localhost` (127.0.0.1)

The Endpoint mappings are as follows:

### Upload API
Endpoint: /upload

Method: POST

Description: This API endpoint is used to upload a file.

Payload: The payload consists of a form-data object with a single field named file, which contains the file to be uploaded.

Example Payload:
```
{
    "file": [file content]
}
```
Response: Upon successful upload, the API returns a JSON object with the following fields:

a. code: A status code indicating the result of the upload operation (e.g., "201" for success).

b. file_path: The path where the uploaded file is stored on the server.

c. message: A message indicating the outcome of the upload operation.

Sample response :
```
{
    "code": "201",
    "file_path": "~/Backend/uploaded_files/Query_20240511_153858.fa",
    "message": "File uploaded successfully"
}
```



### Predict API
Endpoint: /predict

Method: POST

Description: This API endpoint is used to make predictions based on the uploaded file.

Payload: The payload is a JSON object containing the following field:

file_path: The path to the uploaded file on the server.
Example Payload:
```
{
    "file_path": "/uploaded_files/Query.fa"
}
```

Response: Upon successful prediction, the API returns a JSON object with the following fields:
```
message: An array of prediction objects, each containing the prediction results.
seq_id: The sequence ID of the prediction.
RNALight_pred_prob: The probability of the prediction.
RNALight_pred_label: The predicted label.
```

Sample Response:
```
{
    "message": [
        {
            "Light_score": 0.8980125885252097,
            "RNALight_pred_label": 1,
            "RNALight_pred_prob": 0.9490062942626049,
            "cdna": "",
            "seq_id": "ENST00000473358.1|ENSG00000243485.5|OTTHUMG00000000959.2|OTTHUMT00000002840.1|MIR1302-2HG-202|MIR1302-2HG|712|"
        },
        {
            "Light_score": 0.9645493794771023,
            "RNALight_pred_label": 1,
            "RNALight_pred_prob": 0.9822746897385511,
            "cdna": "",
            "seq_id": "ENST00000469289.1|ENSG00000243485.5|OTTHUMG00000000959.2|OTTHUMT00000002841.2|MIR1302-2HG-201|MIR1302-2HG|535|"
        },
        {
            "Light_score": 0.9889290589236879,
            "RNALight_pred_label": 1,
            "RNALight_pred_prob": 0.9944645294618439,
            "cdna": "",
            "seq_id": "ENST00000417324.1|ENSG00000237613.2|OTTHUMG00000000960.1|OTTHUMT00000002842.1|FAM138A-201|FAM138A|1187|"
        }
    ]
}
```


## Frontend

For the frontend part, simply go to the [Frontend](https://github.com/abhishek23008/RNALightImpl_Website/tree/main/Frontend/rnalightimpl) directory, and run 
```
npm start
```
